pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fractal Dimension Analysis of Soil Particle Size Distribution // Function for the computation of fractal dimension based on mass of soil particle size distribution by Tyler Wheatcraft (1992) doi:10.2136/sssaj1992.03615995005600020005x. It also provides functions for calculation of mean weight and geometric mean diameter of particle size distribution by Perfect et al. (1992) doi:10.2136/sssaj1992.03615995005600050012x.
